summary: Set in 2002, an abandoned 5-year-old boy living in a rundown orphanage in a small Russian village is adopted by an Italian family.
cast: Nikolay Spiridonov|Mariya Kuznetsova|Nikolay Reutov|Yuriy Itskov|Denis Moiseenko|Andrey Elizarov|Aleksandr Sirotkin|Vladimir Shipov|Polina Vorobeva|Olga Shuvalova|Dmitriy Zemlyanko|Darya Yurgens|Rudolf Kuld|Tatyana Zakharova|Irina Osnovina|Elena Malinovskaya|Andrey Dezhonov|Vladimir Kosmidaylo|Anatoliy Agroskin|Vladimir Kuteynikov|Sergey Zhukovich|Dmitriy Konokotov|Diana Shishlyaeva|Olga Lysenkova|Vladimir Ryazantsev|Aleksey Koshevoy
title: Italyanets
